introduction_key1: What do we mean by lists and #
introduction_key2: You might have studied about string, integer, float and boolean data types. These are called primitive data types where primitive means simple data types. We can use primitive data types to make complex data types. List is one of the complex data type.
introduction_key4: What 10 things do you want to do in your life, make its list.
introduction_key5: Now, store it in a python variable.
introduction_key7: In this way, you will get a lot of information in the form of a list. Example :-
introduction_key8: Make a list of Groceries that you want to buy.
introduction_key9: Make a list of Courses that you can do at NavGurukul.
introduction_key10: Make a list of questions that you have to do in a given course.
introduction_key11: List of all the good habits that you have.
introduction_key12: List of Companies where you want to work.
introduction_key13: List of students present in the campus.
introduction_key16: We will see that how important it is for us to study List Data Type and List Data Structure.
